body_html:
the original intent of the tutorials was to keep the examples minimal and self-contained
the longer term intent is to convert these into IPython Notebooks

I strongly agreed.
Thank you for the comment.

When I leaned TensorFlow, I felt a big barrier between the beginner's mnist tutorial and the expert's one.
It's a reason that I wrote the code which has the same style between those.
I am looking forward to see such a sophisticated tutorial and code.

body:
> the original intent of the tutorials was to keep the examples minimal and self-contained
> the longer term intent is to convert these into IPython Notebooks

I strongly agreed.
Thank you for the comment.

When I leaned TensorFlow, I felt a big barrier between the beginner's mnist tutorial and the expert's one.
It's a reason that I wrote the code which has the same style between those.
I am looking forward to see such a sophisticated tutorial and code.
